articles.summary: Watch highlights as St Mirren's Alex Gogic scores a late equaliser to deny Livingston their first victory in the Scottish Premiership since early August.

articles.title: Champions League quiz: Name every city to host a final
articles.summary: The Champions League and its forerunner the European Cup have a combined 70-year history. Can you name all the cities that have staged the final of the men's competition?

articles.title: Frank: 'Magic' Dortmund win proves we're all on the same page
articles.summary: Under-pressure Tottenham head coach Thomas Frank hailed their "magic" Champions League home win over Borussia Dortmund as evidence that everyone at the club is "on the same page".

articles.title: Arsenal on course to win the Premier League – but why stop there?
articles.summary: Inter needed the points more. Arsenal took them anyway. Seven changes to Mikel Arteta's starting line-up and still they made it seven wins from seven. A top-two finish secured let alone top eight &#82...

articles.title: 'Tears in my eyes' - Jesus enjoys 'dream night' in San Siro
articles.summary: Gabriel Jesus says he had "tears in my eyes" after scoring twice to help Arsenal win 3-1 at Inter Milan for a seventh successive win in the Champions League.

articles.title: Slot hints Salah will start for Liverpool in Marseille

articles.title: 'Everything is going wrong' - Guardiola on Bodo/Glimt upset
articles.summary: Pep Guardiola responds to his team's second defeat in four days as Manchester City lose at Bodo/Glimt in the Champions League.

articles.title: Arsenal depth of quality 'incredible' - Arteta
articles.summary: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta was delighted with Gabriel Jesus's display and two goals in the 3-1 Champions League win at Inter Milan, showing the "incredible" depth of quality in his squad.

articles.title: Frank on how he is managing the pressure at Spurs
articles.summary: Thomas Frank feels his Tottenham Hotspur side are getting better and that he deserves patience following their two goal win over 10-man Borussia Dortmund in the Champions League.

articles.title: Fulham in talks to sign Man City winger Bobb
articles.summary: Fulham are in talks to sign winger Oscar Bobb from fellow Premier League side Manchester City.

articles.title: The day I discovered the Everton contract Revie never signed
articles.summary: This is the story of how an unsigned contract that lay hidden in a bungalow for more than 50 years could have changed the course of English football.

articles.title: Return of the 0-0 - is the Premier League getting boring?
articles.summary: Two goalless fixtures at the weekend mean this season's Premier League has already featured more 0-0 draws than the whole of last term – but does that mean the league has been boring?

articles.title: Refs' boss Webb backs officials over Dalot incident
articles.summary: Premier League referees' boss Howard Webb rejects claims that his officials made a mistake by not sending off Diogo Dalot in Saturday's Manchester derby.
